revised_title: Isotopic Constitution and Atomic Weights of Selected Elements
tldr: The author conducted mass spectrometry experiments to determine the isotopic constitution and atomic weights of various elements, including selenium, bromine, boron, tungsten, antimony, osmium, ruthenium, tellurium, germanium, rhenium, and chlorine. The results provided insights into the isotopic moments, packing fractions, and atomic weights of these elements, contributing to a better understanding of their chemical properties.
